page.title: 18THE TROUT FARM
page.content:
The trout farm is in the pretty little village called Membury.It has six ponds and you can fish your self.You have to put them back after.When they are full,you can't fish your self.One pond is on the other side of the road and there is a gate to go through.There you will see the young trout about a week old.The first pond is for the parent fish.The second third and fourth ponds are where fish can be caught and sold .Previously the building was used as a flour mill driven by the water wheel which still can be seen_thus the name Rock Mill.
Darryl Drew ,10.
